meanings.definition: The action or process of selecting or being selected.
meanings.sent1: The selection of a winner was made by drawing names from a hat.
meanings.sent2: She carefully made her selection from the menu before ordering.
meanings.sent3: The selection of the best costume at the party caused much excitement.
meanings.sent4: His selection of words in the speech was like painting a vivid picture.
meanings.sent5: The selection of flowers for the bouquet added a touch of elegance.

meanings.definition: A carefully chosen or representative collection of things.
meanings.sent1: The store's selection of fruits and vegetables was always fresh.
meanings.sent2: The museum's art selection included famous paintings from different eras.
meanings.sent3: His selection of jokes for the comedy show had everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: The selection of books in the library was a treasure trove for readers.
meanings.sent5: The selection of music played at the event set the perfect mood.

meanings.definition: The act of choosing someone or something from a group.
meanings.sent1: The selection of the team captain was based on skill and leadership.
meanings.sent2: Her selection of a new car took weeks of research and test drives.
meanings.sent3: The selection of the best student in the class was a tough decision.
meanings.sent4: His selection of the right tool for the job made the task easier.
meanings.sent5: The selection of the winning entry in the contest brought cheers from the crowd.
